channel.title: [PI] P ring Help REP++
channel.description:
Hey Everyone,
I have a ring on my server, that gives pretty much max stats for everything when worn, I would like to remove that.
I went to item.cfg, and found that the items had 0 accross the board.
Where do I change the equipment bonuses for it?
Thanks in advance

item.title: [PI] P ring Help REP++
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] P ring Help REP++
item.dc:creator: @xenmaster1 xenmaster1
item.description:
@xenmaster1 wrote:

Can you guys email me a tutorial on how to make p ring for pwnxile please that would be really helpful because i’m not seeing any item.ass

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] P ring Help REP++
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

goto itemass

under duelrule 21 target slot 13

add this

if ((wearid == URPRINGSID) && (c.playerrights == 0){
sendMessage(“this is for staff only!”);
return;

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] P ring Help REP++
item.dc:creator: @andy_d_b34st andy d b34st
item.description:
@andy_d_b34st wrote:

Just take the item ID and go through client.java, itemassistant.java, item.java, all that stuff searching for the ID, or use z-file searcher. Otherwise I have noooo idea

Read full topic

Can i have some help please i want to make a p ring but i dont kno what to do can u email me a tutorial keston-foster@hotmail.com please

item.title: [PI] P ring Help REP++
item.dc:creator: @Owner_John_Clark Owner John Clark
item.description:
@Owner_John_Clark wrote:

[quote=“aquikzebra, post:1, topic:398277”]Hey Everyone,

I have a ring on my server, that gives pretty much max stats for everything when worn, I would like to remove that.

I went to item.cfg, and found that the items had 0 accross the board.

Where do I change the equipment bonuses for it?

Thanks in advance[/quote]

Sometimes with a PI there are 2 item.cfg’s one in data/data/cfg/item.cfg & data/cfg/item.cfg

Try editing the second one above, and check the other one just incase…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] P ring Help REP++
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:13, topic:398277”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=495412.msg3621968#msg3621968 date=1307499087]
item.cfg is the only file that has the bonuses, no other files, try compiling and re-running…
[/quote]You don’t need to compile a CFG file… Its not java. OOO! WAIT! IT MIGHT BE IN THE BIN FILE INSTEAD OF DATA![/quote]
oh your smart i didnt know that… stfu ofc i knew it im just helping fail troll

Read full topic

just change everything to 99999?

[/quote]
I laughed at that lol

Go into Data -> cfg -> item.cfg and search your item ID. See all those little 99999 things? Change them to the stat you want.[/quote]

All the stats there are 0’s, but ingame there 30000
